title: EXT_implicit_ellipsoid_region extension on KHR_implicit_shapes.shape
description: Extension of `KHR_implicit_shapes.shape` to represent an implicit ellipsoid region in a glTF model.

semiMajorAxisRadius.description: The radius along the semi-major axis of the reference ellipsoid in meters. Corresponds to the radii along the X and Z axes.

semiMinorAxisRadius.description: The radius along the semi-minor axis of the reference ellipsoid in meters. Corresponds to the radius along the Y-axis.

minHeight.description: The minimum height of the region relative to the ellipsoid's surface, in meters. May be negative.

maxHeight.description: The maximum height of the region relative to the ellipsoid's surface, in meters. May be negative.

minLatitude.description: The minimum latitude (a.k.a. polar angle) of the region, in radians. Must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].

maxLatitude.description: The maximum latitude (a.k.a. polar angle) of the region, in radians. Must be in the range [-pi/2, pi/2].

minLongitude.description: The minimum longitude (a.k.a. azimuthal angle) of the region, in radians. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].

maxLongitude.description: The maximum longitude (a.k.a. azimuthal angle) of the region, in radians. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].
